admin.astor
Class TangoHost

java.lang.Object
  fr.esrf.TangoApi.Connection
      fr.esrf.TangoApi.DeviceProxy
          admin.astor.TangoHost
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.esrf.TangoApi.ApiDefs
public class TangoHost
extends fr.esrf.TangoApi.DeviceProxy

Class Description: Host object containing servers list. This class inherit from device proxy. It is seen as the Starter device running on this host.

Author:
verdier
